page.title: 16BURNHAM MARKET SCHOOL
page.content: There are 150 children attending the school and there are seven teachers. Their names are: Mrs. Evans, Mrs. Kimberlin, Mrs. Crouch, Mrs. Hooke, Mrs. Bruce, Mrs. Nudds and Mr. Aitken is the Headteacher. The children who come to Burnham Market School live in lots of different villages around Burnham Market and they come to school in two mini-buses. We have lots of different lessons like English, Maths, Art and Craft, French and we also have a swimming lesson once a fortnight at the Alderman Peel High School in Wells. Everyone at school stays for lunch. Some children have packed lunches which they eat in the dining hall with the children who have school dinners. In the summer we sometimes eat our packed lunches out on the grass in the sunshine.
